message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the significant value it holds for you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1000000 is simply too low for me. While I'm open to negotiating, I can't go below $1100000. I believe this is still a great deal for you, considering the product's value to your business. Let's find a compromise.

I understand your position, but I'm still not comfortable with $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1050000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll get from the product.
